description:
Luffy tries desperately to free himself as the risk of his own well-being! Meanwhile, Chopper and Carrot continue to search the mirror universe, Brook squares off against Big Mom, and Pedro’s past is revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Geschichte ihres linken Auges! – Pedro vs. Baron Tamago!
Hidari Me no Innen: Pedro tai Tamago-Danshaku
Le destin de l`œil gauche. Pedro vs. baron Tamago
The History of the Left Eye! Pedro vs. Baron Tamago!
Судьба левого глаза! Педро против Барона Тамаго!
قصّة العين اليسرى! بيدرو ضد البارون تاماغو
左眼の因縁 ペドロVS[たい]タマゴ男爵
